title: As Israelis Protest Mounting Authoritarianism, Apartheid Regime Over Palestinians Goes Unchallenged
description:
Palestinians who face a decadeslong military occupation are ignored by a protest movement that claims to defend democracy.

The post As Israelis Protest Mounting Authoritarianism, Apartheid Regime Over Palestinians Goes Unchallenged appeared first on The Intercept.

title: With a Holy Week Indictment, Donald Trump Is Entering Jesus Territory
description:
